name: Messier 83 - [AUDIOVISUAL EXPERIMENT]
description:
This composition was written and produced under my pseudonym "insonia", which is an ambient music project having as main instrument the piano and si-fi themes, being a contemplative work. To compose this piece, I created a 3D art and added reactive effects to the sound, making the music as soundscape to the visual 'pixelscape' generated.

The EP is available on streaming platforms. Contact us to request usage.
Listen using headphones or two stereo speakers for better experience.
MP4 - 640 x 480 30 FPS
Stereo 48kHz 24 bits
